utility

Class DBController

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.DBController

  • public class DBController
extends java.lang.Object
    The interface which which this java application accesses the sqlite database.
    Author:
    Tim

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The name of the database file.
      static java.lang.String DB_URL
      The URL to the database as needed for JDBC.
      static int TIMEOUT
      The number of seconds to wait for a database connection before timing out.

                               java.lang.String term)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get a course based on its courseID and term.
        Parameters:
        courseID - the course's ID, eg: COMP4770-001
        term - the semester which this course offering occured, eg: WINTER16
        Returns:
        the Course object or null if not found

        Returns:
        a map container all courses in the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an sql error occurs

      • getEnrollment

        public static java.lang.String[] getEnrollment(java.lang.String username,
                                               java.lang.String courseID,
                                               java.lang.String term)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get an enrollment table entry based on a username and a course offering. The username uniquely identifies a User while a course ID and a term uniquely identify a course offering. The return is a String array with entries: username, courseID, term, and role, in that order. Null is returned if there is no such enrollment entry.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the User to get enrollment for
        courseID - the ID of the course
        term - the term the course was offered
        Returns:
        a String array representing the enrollment or null if no such enrollment
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an sql error occurs

      • getInstructor

        public static User getInstructor(Course course)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given a course get the instructor for the course.
        Parameters:
        course - the course to find the Instructor for
        Returns:
        the User object representing the instructor or null if not found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an sql error occurs

      • getAllEnrollmentsForUser

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Course> getAllEnrollmentsForUser(User user)
                                                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get all the enrollments for a particular User based on their current active role. A map is returned where the key is a String representing the course of the form courseID|term and the object is a Course.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to the find enrollments for
        Returns:
        a map representing all enrollments for the user.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getAllEnrollments

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> getAllEnrollments()
                                                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get all enrollments for all Users. A map is returned with keys of the form username|courseID|term|role and the object is a String array of the key split on the pipe symbol.
        Returns:
        a map representing all enrollments
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an sql error occurs

      • addEnrollment

        public static void addEnrollment(java.lang.String[] enrollment)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Add an enrollment to the database. The enrollment array should contain strings in the order: username, courseID, term, role.
        Parameters:
        enrollment - an array containing the necessary strings to define an enrollment
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an sql error occurs

      • removeEnrollment

        public static void removeEnrollment(java.lang.String[] enrollment)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Remove a User from all roles of a given course. Enrollment should contain stirngs in the order: username, courseID, term.
        Parameters:
        enrollment - the array of String which specify an enrollment
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an sql error occurs

      • getAllAssignments

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Assignment> getAllAssignments()
                                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get all Assignments currently on the system.
        Returns:
        a map where keys are of the form courseID|term|assignmentNumber and the objects are Assigments.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addAssignment

        public static void addAssignment(java.lang.String courseID,
                                 java.lang.String term,
                                 int number,
                                 java.lang.String assignName,
                                 java.lang.String assignmentPath,
                                 java.lang.String testPath,
                                 int submissionLimit)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Add an assignment to the database.
        Parameters:
        courseID - the course ID of the Course the Assignment is for
        term - the term of the course offering
        number - the number this assignment represents
        assignName - the name of the assignment
        assignmentPath - the path to the root directory of the assignment
        testPath - the path to the test suites for the assignment
        submissionLimit - the number of possible submissions for this assignment
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getGrade

        public static Grade getGrade(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String courseID,
                             java.lang.String term,
                             int number)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get the Grade associated with a User's Assignment
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the User for which to get the Assignment mark
        courseID - the ID of the course the Assignment is for
        term - the term of the course offering
        number - the assignment number for which the grade is being retrieved
        Returns:
        a Grade object encapsulating Assignment feedback.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an sql error occurs

      • getAllGrades

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Grade> getAllGrades()
                                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get all Grades in the database. Returns a map where the keys are strings of the form: username|courseID|term|number such that the username describes the User who submitted the assignment for the course described by courseID and term. The number is the assignment number for the particular course.
        Returns:
        a map containing all Grades in the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an sql error occurs

      • modifyStatement

        public static void modifyStatement(java.lang.String statementType,
                                   DBObject[] dbArray)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given a prepared statement String, and an array of DBObjects, insert those database objects into the PreparedStatement.
